duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality care to patients in the telemetry unit, monitoring vital signs and symptoms.
Collaborate with healthcare team to create and modify patient care plans as needed.
Administer medications and treatments as prescribed by the physician.
Utilize electronic medical records (EMR) systems to accurately document patient care.
Educate patients and their families about their condition, treatment options, and at-home care.
Respond to medical emergencies and ensure proper protocols are followed.

education_certification.credential: Associate's or Bachelor's degree in Nursing (BSN preferred)
RN License in the state of practice
